text: Cierra Alexa Ram√≠rez (born March 9, 1995) is an American actress and singer. She plays the role of Mariana Adams-Foster in the Freeform television series The Fosters. Ramirez is of Colombian and Mexican descent. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1995 births Category:Living people Category:American child actors Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors Category:Actors from Houston Category:Singers from Houston
